article.title: DRS Wins $339 Million Joint Effects Targeting System Contract
article.text: DRS Network and Imaging Systems, Melbourne, Florida, was awarded a $339,305,395 firm-fixed-price contract for the Joint Effects Targeting System. Bids were solicited via the Internet, with two received. Work locations and funding will be determined with each order, with an estimated completion date of SeptemberÂ 21, 2021. The Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen, Maryland, is the contracting activity (W91CRB-16-D0028).
